popularityCurve.label: releasing most of the illegal immigrants currently in detention so that they can disappear into the wider community and undercut the pay of working families

clusterList.phrase: releasing most of the illegal immigrants currently in detention so that they can disappear into the wider community and undercut the pay of working families
the benefit is that they won't be put into detention
it marginalizes them for life barring people from employment education opportunities and housing options
